incident_updates.body:
Between 04:00 UTC and 05:30 UTC, Cloudflare experienced an issue that impacted new Cloudflare Tunnel registrations. Customers may have observed connection errors or timeouts when attempting to establish new tunnels or restart existing cloudflared instances during this window.

This incident only affected the registration and connection of new tunnels. Tunnels that were already established and running prior to the incident were not impacted.

The issue has been resolved, and the service is fully operational.

incidents.name: Media Transformations returning errors for uncached requests

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

A rollback has been released, media transformations traffic is returning to normal. Team is continuing to monitor. Stream uploaded/live broadcasts were not affected. Image transformations were not affected.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Stream engineering has identified an error causing uncached requests for media transformations (short form video optimization) are returning errors. Stream on-demand and live broadcasts are not affected. Image Transformations are not affected.
This incident has been resolved.
A few API requests to the Workers upload API may fail and need retrying.
